src:
Tim Gabungan Tangkap Satu DPO Kerusuhan Wamena
02 Nov 2019, 21:47 by Denisa Tristianty


Tim Gabungan Tangkap Satu DPO Kerusuhan Wamena

KBRN, Jakarta : Kepala Bidang (Kabid) Humas Polda Papua, Kombes Pol Ahmad Kamal menyatakan telah melakukan penangkapan terhadap satu daftar pencarian orang (DPO) berinisial YA, Jumat (1/11/2019) dini hari kemarin. Penangkapan itu terkait kerusuhan Wamena dan dilakukan oleh Kepolisian Resor Jayawijaya.
“YA, sudah ditetapkan sebagai tersangka dalam kasus kerusuhan yang menewaskan 33 orang itu,” kata Ahmad di Papua, seperti dilansir Kantor Berita Antara, Sabtu (2/11/2019).
Penangkapan itu, lanjut Ahmad, terjadi di kawasan Kampung Ninabua. Tersangka YA juga sempat melarikan diri ketika penangkapan itu dilakukan tim Kepolisian Resor Jayawijaya.
Polisi juga menemukan barang bukti berupa baju dan rambut palsu yang diduga didunakan YA saat memimpin aksi kerusuhan, pada Senin (23/9/2019) lalu.
Ahmad juga menjelaskan, penangkapan dilakukan aparat gabungan TNI-Polri. YA sebagai tersangka dijerat Pasal 160 KUHP dengan ancaman hukuman paling lama enam tahun penjara.
“Kami mencatat, masih ada tiga orang masuk DPO kerusuhan Wamena. Tiga tersangka yang masih DPO itu yakni HW (22), BA (21), dan PW (21),” ungkapnya. (ANTARA FOTO/Abriawan Abhe/wsj)
text:
Joint Team of Capture One DPO Wamena Riot
02 Nov 2019, 21:47 by Denisa Tristianty


Joint Team of Capture One DPO Wamena Riot

KBRN, Jakarta: Head of Public Relations (Kabid) of the Papua Regional Police, Kombes Pol Ahmad Kamal said that he had made an arrest on a search list (DPO) with the initials YES, Friday (11/01/2019) early yesterday morning. The arrest was related to the Wamena riot and was carried out by the Jayawijaya District Police.
"YES, it has been established as a suspect in the riots that killed 33 people," Ahmad said in Papua, as reported by the Antara News Agency, Saturday (11/02/2019).
The arrest, continued Ahmad, took place in the area of Kampung Ninabua. The YES suspect also escaped when the arrest was made by the Jayawijaya District Police Team.
The police also found evidence in the form of clothes and wigs that allegedly used by YA while leading the riots on Monday (9/23/2019).
Ahmad also explained that the arrest was carried out by a joint TNI-Polri apparatus. YES as a suspect was charged under Article 160 of the Criminal Code with a maximum sentence of six years imprisonment.
"We note, there are still three people in the DPO in Wamena riots. The three suspects who are still DPOs are HW (22), BA (21), and PW (21), "he said. (BETWEEN PHOTOS / Abriawan Abhe / wsj)
